Created attachment 505162
complete stack

Steps to reproduce:

-> Install the latest Personas Demo into a Trunk Debug build. see bug 598144
-> Change a persona 

--> Assertion (also seen on Mac 10.6)

###!!! ASSERTION: U+0080/U+0100 - U+FFFF data lost: 'legalRange', file c:/work/mozilla/builds/2.0.0/mozilla-central/js/src/xpconnect/src/xpcconvert.cpp, line 847
comments.creator: cbook@mozilla.com
